thread.title_full: McGivern Diamonds reviewed by Michael Gilhooly

author: Michael Gilhooly
title: Michael Gilhooly
text: McGivern came highly recommended from the sister of my soon-to-be fianc√©. Mike did not disappoint. I live two states away and Mike worked with me over the phone and through email to develop the perfect ring for her and it turned out even better than I expected. Mike has earned my future business and I look forward to working with him again.
